name: DragonBall Z Defense
description:
The forces of evil have cloned Disney character plushies to chase each other around the Dragonball Universe. Can Goku save the city and rescue Disney's good name? Tune in next time on Dragon Ball Defense!

Up/Down to move
Space to shoot (protect good guys on left from the evil guys on the right)
Click the speaker in the lower left to toggle music on/off
